name: Okita Soji [Restoration]
skill: Restores 1776/2256 HP to 2 allies (melee priority). Targets receive 45%/57% less DMG for a limited time.
ability: Increases own level by 13 when another member of the Shinsengumi is on the team.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the captain of the first unit of the Shinsengumi, a group of swordmen who maintained the peace in the capital's streets. He's been ravaged by disease, but you'd never guess it from the way he beats up brutes. Having failed to keep the peace in his former life, he is utterly commited to doing so this time around and has no mercy for anyone causing a disturbance on the streets.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Meiji Monster on a Rampage" Event: Defeat LVL 10, 20, 30 Commodore Perry [Demonic].
◦ "Meiji Monster on a Rampage" Event: Random drops after LVL 10.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the total Event Points by Small during the "Meiji Monster on a Rampage" event.
◦ With his ability active, his stats are 5885/7061 (MAX) or 7426/8694 (MLB)
◦ With his ability active, his skill restores 2088/2568 HP to 2 allies and targets receive 52/64% less DMG for a limited time. (MAX/MLB)

main: "We protect the streets of the capital."
summon: "Let's bring peace to the streets, together."
